pages.text: Unlike most other demons who lurk outside of the threshold of our world in hellish locations, Druden are known to lurk in the darkest of forests, often tormenting travelers with their oaken claws and darker forms of nature magic. However, they do not harm animals, and in turn, animals do not harm them, even tamed creatures will disobey their master in the presence of a Druden. Unlike the typical demons, Druden cannot stand fire and will quickly ignite if exposed to it. They are known to also associate with a Demonic Noble known as Herne, also known as the Horned Huntsman, and join him in the Wild Hunt.
